quote: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Motivation gets you going; Inspiration keeps you going.
author: Todd Stocker,  Refined: Turning Pain Into Purpose

quote: Inspiration fires you up; motivation keeps you burning.
author: Stuart Aken

quote: It is action that creates motivation.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: Where are the quotes?
author: Yousef Yousef

quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it's the determination and commitment to unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: Inspirational quotes are dances of light that shine in dark places during your life.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it's determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: Desire is the key to motivation, but it’s determination and commitment to an unrelenting pursuit of your goal - a commitment to excellence - that will enable you to attain the success you seek.
author: Mario Andretti

quote: Self-Motivation [10w] "Today I'll do something more extraordinarythan I did yesterday.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Ryun

quote: I'm not an inspirational quote kind of person.
author: Christine Teigen

quote: Quotes ain’t all that useful. Fact is, there’s more concise ways to express what you’re feelin’, like screams and moans.
author: M.C. Humphreys

quote: In motivating people, you've got to engage their minds and their hearts. I motivate people, I hope, by example - and perhaps by excitement, by having productive ideas to make others feel involved.
author: Rupert Murdoch

quote: I don't think it's a Western thing to really talk about intrinsic motivation and the drive for autonomy, mastery and purpose. You have to not be struggling for survival. For people who don't know where their next meal is coming, notions of finding inner motivation are comical.
author: Daniel H. Pink

quote: Quotation confesses inferiority.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson,  Uncollected Writings

quote: I love quotations because it is a joy to find thoughts one might have, beautifully expressed with much authority by someone recognized wiser than oneself.
author: Marlene Dietrich

quote: Motivation will almost always beat mere talent.
author: Norman Ralph Augustine

quote: I have a self-made quote: Celebrate diversity, practice acceptance and may we all choose peaceful options to conflict.
author: Donzella Michele Malone

quote: Every quote is like a Picasso. The meaning is different for each person and half the admirers miss the true intent and twisted humor of it all.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Always be wary of people who use quotes. I don't know who said that.' - Murdoc Niccals
author: Gorillaz,  Gorillaz: Rise of the Ogre

quote: Earl Nightingale has inspired more people toward success and fortune than any other motivational speaker on the planet.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: That is why enemies can be great motivators. They serve as fuel for your fire.
author: Simon Zingerman,  We All Need Heroes: Stories of the Brave and Foolish

quote: I quote others only in order the better to express myself.
author: Michel de Montaigne,  The Complete Essays

quote: In life, you need either inspiration or desperation.
author: Anthony Robbins

quote: [A] quotation is a handy thing to have about, saving one the trouble of thinking for oneself, always a laborious business."(The Record Lie)
author: A.A. Milne,  If I May

quote: Once you can let go of illusion and draw upon a more universal source of motivation then you will re connect with your true purpose on Earth.
author: Gary Markwick

quote: Strong lives are motivated by dynamic purposes.
author: Kenneth Hildebrand

quote: I hate quotations. Tell me what you know.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson,  The Essays of Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Life becomes inspiring, not in spite of the problems and the hard hits, but because of them.
author: Joni Eareckson Tada

quote: Inspiration is what keeps us well.
author: James Redfield,  The Tenth Insight: Holding the Vision

quote: All the effort in the world won't matter if you're not inspired.
author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Diary

quote: let your haters be your motivators
author: Nikki Carter

quote: The starting point of all achievement is desire.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: ‎"With each experience we grow and become more aware of the inner beauty that lies within us. Ultimately we are truly our own leader. We lead the connection and flow of life that is our inheritance.
author: Rabbi Yossi

quote: A teacher will be frustrated if she is only motivated to teach what she has learned. Yet, if she is motivated because of the students, then she will learn from them how to teach.
author: Tanya R. Liverman,  Memoirs of an Educarer: An Inspiration for Education

quote: Inspiration is external and motivation is internal. It is up to me to provide the switch and you to flip it on!
author: Tricia Cunningham,  The Reverse Diet: Lose 20, 50, 100 Pounds or More by Eating Dinner for Breakfast and Breakfast for Dinner

quote: I want to be motivational and inspirational for everybody: my big aim is more women on bicycles.
author: Marianne Vos

quote: There's always the motivation of wanting to win. Everybody has that. But a champion needs, in his attitude, a motivation above and beyond winning.
author: Pat Riley

quote: One of the things that I did before I ran for president is I was a professional speaker. Not a motivational speaker - an inspirational speaker. Motivation comes from within. You have to be inspired. That's what I do. I inspire people, I inspire the public, I inspire my staff. I inspired the organizations I took over to want to succeed.
author: Herman Cain

quote: Are you desperate or determined? With desperation comes frustration. With determination comes purpose, achievement, and peace….
author: James A. Murphy,  The Waves of Life Quotes and Daily Meditations

quote: There are two motives for reading a book; one, that you enjoy it; the other, that you can boast about it.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: My motivation and aspiration is the same, being number one or being number five. So that's the truth. And my goal is the same - it's to always be happy playing, it's to enjoy the game and improve always.
author: Rafael Nadal

quote: Many of the factors that we think will cause motivation, such as fair pay and a good manager, won't make you love your job. Even if you eliminate what makes you dissatisfied, that doesn't make you motivated. It doesn't make your work rewarding. You just are less bothered by things.
author: Clayton Christensen

quote: Quotes are made we to think, we have made a mistake so quotes will put us in the right way? (But can we understand them - is the best question)
author: Deyth Banger

quote: Inspiration comes from so many sources. Music, other fiction, the non-fiction I read, TV shows, films, news reports, people I know, stories I hear, misheard words or lyrics, dreams... Motivation? The memory of the rush I get from a really good writing session - even on a bad day, I know I'll find that again if I keep going.
author: Trudi Canavan

quote: Resistance is a powerful motivator precisely because it enables us to fulfill our longing to achieve our goals while letting us boldly recognize and name the obstacles to those achievements.
author: Derrick A. Bell

quote: Life itself is a quotation.
author: Jorge Luis Borges

quote: When we fail, our pride supports us, and when we succeed it betrays us.
author: Charles Colton

quote: It is my ambition to say in ten sentences what others say in a whole book.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche
